metadata.title: CVE-2020-28590 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the Obj FileTriangleMesh::TriangleMesh() functionality of Slic3r libslic3r 1.3.0 andMaster Commit 92abbc42. A specially crafted obj file could lead toinformation disclosure. An attacker can provide a malicious file to triggerthis vulnerability.

criterions.comment: slic3r package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
